verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w began|strong="G0756"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* to \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the sea \w side|strong="G2281"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w gathered|strong="G4863"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w a|strong="G3793"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w entered|strong="G1684"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w*, and \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3793"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w by|strong="G4314"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w*.
